name: Push Fold Entity
description:
Push Fold Entity improves efficiency of your shallow stack games by optimizing and speeding up decision making process.

•Make fast and optimal decisions
•Exploit all +EV situations
•Boost your game with Push Fold Entity!

***Features***

+Friendly interface
+Push Fold Entity covers three situations (PUSH CALL OVERCALL)
+Visualized hand ranges (Clear colored charts. Text version also included)
+Instant response (All situations are pre-calculated)
+Internet connection is not required

Chart calculations are based on the Nash equilibrium and use ChipEV model
